description.p: New queueing capabilities, canned images, expanded support for HTML markup, and more.

discussion.p: Photo fields now have support for "canned images" obtained from On-Device Data. The read-only setting of a field may now be dynamically changed through TPL calculations. A menu has been added to the Login Screen, along with the capability to set custom values for the Server URL.
Continued adding additional functionality to the TPL system.
Added optional ability for an account's users to request unassigned form instances be assigned to them through a "Claim Forms" extension accessible through a menu choice.
Added the "TransForm System Message" functionality to allow system-wide notification of users of important information, such as upcoming server maintenance, through a pop-up message.
Fixed various bugs and other issues, and added other minor capabilities.
